thread.section_title: Omni Financial Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Omni Financial | www.omnitaxhelp.com
thread.title: Rodney Neal
thread.title_full: Omni Financial reviewed by Rodney Neal

author: Rodney Neal
title: Rodney Neal
text:
I would like to express my gratitude to the Omni Financial office in Vero Beach, Florida. The representative I had the pleasure of working with Kristen Cinque was second to none. In the beginning stages it will be challenging because the only way they can help you is for you to send the information that they request of you. Everything is time sensitive therefore if you don't take it seriously don't bother wasting your time.
Folks this works. I actually saved over $170,000 dollars in reference to my Offer n Compromise. All the request and constant deadlines that I responded on time and took very serious paid off in the end.
Today I have a fresh start and I owe it all first and foremost to a spiritual aspect an second to Omni Financial and my Rep. Kristen Cinque. She no doubt is the best in the business.
Last I just want to say its never too late to get a handle on your tax mess. The longer you procrastinate the worst it will become. It doesn't go away it gets worst.
Pickup the phone right now and call Omni Financial and ask for Kristen Cinque or her assistant they are the best. It feels good to have a fresh start with the Internal Revenue Service.
Respectfully yours,
R Neal
